name: The Lobster Pot
description: Famous seafood restaurant with a great view of the harbor.

name: Black Cat Tavern
description: Casual waterfront dining with a focus on fresh seafood.

name: Captain Parker's Pub
description: Known for their award-winning clam chowder and casual atmosphere.

name: Del Mar Bistro
description: Upscale bistro offering a mix of New American and Mediterranean cuisine.

name: Matt's Blackboard
description: Cozy restaurant with an ever-changing menu based on local, seasonal ingredients.

name: Cape Cod Beer
description: Local brewery offering tours, tastings, and a glimpse into the craft beer-making process.

name: Ceraldi
description: Intimate seven-course tasting menu featuring hyper-local ingredients and innovative preparations.

name: The Pheasant
description: Upscale-casual restaurant in a historic building, focusing on locally sourced ingredients.

name: Hangar B Eatery
description: Quirky breakfast and lunch spot located in the Chatham Municipal Airport.

name: The Canteen
description: Casual eatery with a beachfront patio, known for their lobster rolls and creative comfort food.

name: Bubala's Fine Foods
description: Long-standing restaurant offering a mix of American classics and seafood dishes.

name: Quahog Republic
description: Lively pub known for their stuffed quahogs, burgers, and local beer selection.

name: Pie in the Sky
description: Popular bakery and cafe known for their delicious pies, pastries, and sandwiches.

name: Crisp Flatbread
description: Modern restaurant specializing in gourmet flatbread pizzas and craft cocktails.

name: Old Yarmouth Inn
description: Historic inn and restaurant dating back to 1696, offering traditional New England fare.

name: The Oyster Company
description: Raw bar and seafood restaurant with a focus on locally farmed oysters.

name: Embargo
description: Upscale tapas restaurant and martini bar with a lively atmosphere.

name: Chez Antoine
description: Authentic French bakery and cafe known for their croissants and pastries.

name: Pain D'Avignon
description: Artisanal bakery and cafe offering freshly baked breads, pastries, and a full restaurant menu.

name: The Impudent Oyster
description: Cozy seafood restaurant known for their fresh oysters and innovative seafood dishes.
